TopicTitle: [WIP] [RA] A-001: Dreams Are No Longer An Option [Foreground]

Articles.Content:
From somewhere in Rankamateur Series 2. I wake up on a space station after the onboard AI decides I would be safer elsewhere. Having lived the life of a 21st century human in a Virtual Reality simulation, I'm understandably put out to find myself in the body of a canine GELF in the 27th century.

This should be interesting.
